output: html_notebook

 Loading data and calculation of moving averages

```{r}

library(quantmod)
library(TTR)

getSymbols ("AAPL", src = "yahoo")    # from yahoo finance

chartSeries(to.weekly(AAPL['2016::2018']), theme = "white")
addEMA(20, col = "red")
addEMA(50, col = "purple")


```
